reason_for_recall: Labeling: Incorrect or Missing Lot and/or Exp Date:The product labels contain a Two-Dimensional ( 2D ) barcode that, when scanned, reveals information specific to the batch of the labeled product, including Expiration Date.  The expiration date included within these 2D barcodes is incorrect and does not match the correct expiration date listed on the face of the label itself.
